Groundwork OpenSource offers open source IT management software Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools.
